医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
评估 PCI 后光流比以改善心脏风险管理宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。本研究的目的是检查经皮冠状动脉介入治疗（PCI）后冠状动脉疾病（CAD）患者的光流比（OFR）的预后表现。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Assessing-post-PCI-optical-flow-ratio-for-improved-cardiac-risk-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Assessing-post-PCI-optical-flow-ratio-for-improved-cardiac-risk-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f33c6a46-01d8-476f-9d35-e600120536b6 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 21:17:22 -0500 Assessing post-PCI optical flow ratio for improved cardiac risk management
10种常见疾病基因检测的选择、优化和验证通过分析一个人基因组中数百万个微小的遗传差异，研究人员可以计算出多基因风险评分，以估计一个人一生中患某种疾病的几率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Selection-optimization-and-validation-of-genic-tests-for-10-common-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Selection-optimization-and-validation-of-genic-tests-for-10-common-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=53f1d9bb-c77e-407b-90e9-f1a6690fed24 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:24:49 -0500 Selection, optimization, and validation of genetic tests for 10 common diseases
绘制 2 型糖尿病的基因组图谱在迄今为止关于 2 型糖尿病的最大全基因组关联研究中，由马萨诸塞大学阿默斯特分校遗传流行病学家共同领导的国际研究小组发现了 1,289 个与 2 型糖尿病相关的遗传标记（其中 145 个是新发现的） ）并生成糖尿病并发症的风险评分。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Mapping-the-genomic-landscape-of-Type-2-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Mapping-the-genomic-landscape-of-Type-2-diabetes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b3ef40cd-f432-4360-b1f6-ada98c0bdb2b Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:17:14 -0500 Mapping the genomic landscape of Type 2 diabetes
研究发现过量烟酸的分解产物与心脏病之间存在联系克利夫兰诊所的研究人员发现了一种导致心血管疾病的新途径，该途径与高水平的烟酸有关，烟酸是一种常见的 B 族维生素，以前被推荐用于降低胆固醇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-discovers-link- Between-a-breakdown-product-from-excess-niacin-and-heart-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-discovers-link- Between-a-breakdown-product-from-excess-niacin-and-heart-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9253bd1e-a31a-41a4-959f-21abf61fd451 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:12:30 -0500 Study discovers link between a breakdown product from excess niacin and heart disease
膳食蛋白质超载与动脉粥样硬化风险增加有关匹兹堡大学医学院的研究人员发现了一种分子机制，过量的膳食蛋白质可能会增加动脉粥样硬化的风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Dietary- Protein-overload-linked-to-increased-atherosclerosis-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Dietary- Protein-overload-linked-to-increased-atherosclerosis-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9c647c58-4ba4-4ec9-8459-4ebe1111b827 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 20:05:40 -0500 Dietary protein overload linked to increased atherosclerosis risk
研究称，COVID-19 与较高的疲劳率有关CDC 和华盛顿大学的一项研究发现，COVID-19 会显着增加疲劳和慢性疲劳的风险，与非 COVID-19 对照组相比，其发病率更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/COVID-19-linked-to-higher-fatigue-rates-says-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/COVID-19-linked-to-higher-fatigue-rates-says-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3324a882-bd61-4b52-a6eb-3d2f3fdc54fd Mon, 19 Feb 2024 18:52:00 -0500 COVID-19 linked to higher fatigue rates, says study
高蛋白饮食和氨基酸亮氨酸的升高可能会导致动脉斑块的形成研究人员对小鼠和人类进行了临床研究，以评估高蛋白质摄入对雷帕霉素复合物 1 自噬信号通路的氨基酸-哺乳动物靶标的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/A-high- Protein-diet-and-elevation-in-the-amino-acid-leucine-may-contribute-to-buildup-of-plaque-动脉内.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/A-high- Protein-diet-and-elevation-in-the-amino-acid-leucine-may-contribute-to-buildup-of-plaque- in-arteries.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a828c7cb-5ff1-4c95-8e12-3a2d0782adff Mon, 19 Feb 2024 14:29:00 -0500 A high-protein diet and elevation in the amino acid leucine may contribute to buildup of plaque in arteries
研究表明，高水平的维生素 B3 分解产物与较高的​​死亡、心脏病和中风风险有关研究人员利用非靶向代谢组学技术来寻找可能导致残余心血管疾病风险的新化合物和途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-suggests-high-levels-of-vitamin-B3-breakdown-products-are-linked-to-higher-risk-of-mortality-heart-攻击和中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-suggests-high-levels-of-vitamin-B3-breakdown-products-are-linked-to-higher-risk-of-mortality-heart-攻击和中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=03c3eb73-5659-4b4d-b6ff-817fbd36f2a0 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 14:10:00 -0500 Study suggests high levels of vitamin B3 breakdown products are linked to higher risk of mortality, heart attacks, and stroke
研究确定了导致家庭护理人员辞职的因素芬兰许多新成立的福利服务县正在寻求削减老年护理服务的成本，特别是全天候护理和家庭护理。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-identizes-factors-driven-home-care-workers-to-quit-their-jobs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Study-identizes-factors-driven-home-care-workers-to-quit-their-jobs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f5499ca5-9317-4cbc-909f-5fab4b189f43 Mon, 19 Feb 2024 11:53:00 -0500
Husker 研究二人组被选为 NIH 靶向基因组编辑交付挑战赛第一阶段获胜者Husker 的一个研究二人组在美国国立卫生研究院竞赛中被评为第一轮获胜者，该竞赛旨在为患有罕见和常见疾病的人的细胞提供基因组编辑技术的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Husker-research-duo-selected-as-Phase-1-winners-in-the-NIHs-Targeted-Genome-Editor-Delivery-Challenge.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240219/Husker-research-duo-selected-as-Phase-1-winners-in-the-NIHs-Targeted-Genome-Editor-Delivery-Challenge.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1636064b-4921-498a-9043-43abe06ee45a Mon, 19 Feb 2024 11:48:01 -0500 Husker research duo selected as Phase 1 winners in the NIH's Targeted Genome Editor Delivery Challenge
